description: This file defines a frontend UI component for editing notes in a note-taking application. It uses LightningJS framework to construct a visual component with editable title and body, delete functionality, and autosave features.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the current note's updated title and/or body via the dataProvider's update method.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Updates the title text in the UI and optionally triggers a save.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Updates the body text in the UI and optionally triggers a save.
